verses.verse: Now this is the history of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and of <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth.<s%> <S%H1121>Sons<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to them <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3315>Japheth:<s%> <S%H1586>Gomer,<s%> <S%H4031>Magog,<s%> <S%H4074>Madai,<s%> <S%H3120>Javan,<s%> <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> and <S%H8494>Tiras.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1586>Gomer:<s%> <S%H813>Ashkenaz,<s%> <S%H7384>Riphath,<s%> and <S%H8425>Togarmah.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3120>Javan:<s%> <S%H473>Elishah,<s%> <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H3794>Kittim,<s%> and <S%H1721>Dodanim.<s%>

Of these were the <S%H339>islands<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> divided <S%H6504>in<s%> their <S%H776>lands,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> after his <S%H3956>language,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> in their <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham:<s%> <S%H3568>Cush,<s%> <S%H4714>Mizraim,<s%> <S%H6316>Put,<s%> and <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush:<s%> <S%H5434>Seba,<s%> <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> <S%H5454>Sabtah,<s%> <S%H7484>Raamah,<s%> and <S%H5455>Sabteca.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7484>Raamah:<s%> <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%>
<S%H3568>Cush<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod.<s%> He <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> a mighty <S%H1368>one<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

He was a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6718>hunter<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H3651>Therefore<s%> it is <S%H559>said,<s%> "Like <S%H5248>Nimrod,<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6718>hunter<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
The <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> was <S%H894>Babel,<s%> <S%H751>Erech,<s%> <S%H390>Accad,<s%> and <S%H3641>Calneh,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar.<s%>
Out of that <S%H776>land<s%> he <S%H3318>went<s%> into <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> <S%H7344>Rehoboth<s%>- <S%H5892>Ir,<s%> <S%H3625>Calah,<s%>
and <S%H7449>Resen<s%> between <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> and <S%H3625>Calah<s%> (the same is the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>).
<S%H4714>Mizraim<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3866>Ludim,<s%> <S%H6047>Anamim,<s%> <S%H3853>Lehabim,<s%> <S%H5320>Naphtuhim,<s%>
<S%H6625>Pathrusim,<s%> <S%H3695>Casluhim<s%> (which the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3318>descended<s%> <S%H3732>from<s%>), and Caphtorim.
<S%H3667>Canaan<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> (his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>), <S%H2845>Heth,<s%>
the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H1622>Girgashite,<s%>
the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> the <S%H6208>Arkite,<s%> the <S%H5513>Sinite,<s%>
the <S%H721>Arvadite,<s%> the <S%H6786>Zemarite,<s%> and the <S%H2577>Hamathite.<s%> <S%H310>Afterward<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> were spread <S%H6327>abroad.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> was from <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> toward <S%H1642>Gerar,<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza;<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> toward <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%H126>Admah,<s%> and <S%H6636>Zeboiim,<s%> to <S%H3962>Lasha.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> after their <S%H3956>languages,<s%> in their <S%H776>lands,<s%> in their <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

To <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of all the children of <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> the <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1419>of<s%> <S%H3315>Japheth,<s%> to him also were children <S%H3205>born.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem:<s%> <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> <S%H804>Asshur,<s%> <S%H775>Arpachshad,<s%> <S%H3865>Lud,<s%> and <S%H758>Aram.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H758>Aram:<s%> <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> <S%H2343>Hul,<s%> <S%H1666>Gether,<s%> and <S%H4851>Mash.<s%>
<S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7974>Shelah.<s%> <S%H7974>Shelah<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber.<s%>

To <S%H5677>Eber<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%> The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H6389>Peleg,<s%> for in his <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H6385>divided.<s%> His <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
<S%H3355>Joktan<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H486>Almodad,<s%> <S%H8026>Sheleph,<s%> <S%H2700>Hazarmaveth,<s%> <S%H3392>Jerah,<s%>
<S%H1913>Hadoram,<s%> <S%H187>Uzal,<s%> <S%H1853>Diklah,<s%>
<S%H5745>Obal,<s%> <S%H39>Abimael,<s%> <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%>
<S%H211>Ophir,<s%> <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab.<s%> All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
Their <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> was from <S%H4852>Mesha,<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> toward <S%H5611>Sephar,<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>
These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> after their <S%H3956>languages,<s%> in their <S%H776>lands,<s%> after their <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> after their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> in their <S%H1471>nations.<s%> Of these were the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6504>divided<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>
